Module comp310_f21_hw08_comp310_f21_hw08_36
Package provided.discovery.impl.model

Class DiscoveryConnector

java.lang.Object
provided.discovery.impl.model.DiscoveryConnector
public class DiscoveryConnector extends Object
Optional utility class to create a connection to the discovery server. Instances of this class must be inside of the main model because it requires an IRMIUtils instance that has already been started. Note that multiple instances of an application running on the same machine should instantiate this class with different discoveryNames and different boundNames.
Author:
Stephen Wong (c) 2019

  • Field Details

    • discMgr

      private IDiscoveryManager discMgr
      The discovery manager that connects with the remote discovery service

    • discoveryName

      private String discoveryName
      The name to be associated with the local endpoint in the remote discovery service. Null if forceWatchOnly = true.

    • boundName

      private String boundName
      The bound name of the RMI stub in the local Registry. The local endpoint is referring to this stub. Null if forceWatchOnly = true.

    • discSrv

      private IDiscoveryServer discSrv
      The IDiscoveryServer that is watching the last category specified. This instance gets replaced if connectToDiscoveryServer() is called again.

    • forceWatchOnly

      private boolean forceWatchOnly
      If true, forces the the DiscoveryConnector to only do watch only.

    • logger

      private ILogger logger
      The logger in use

  • Constructor Details

    • DiscoveryConnector

      public DiscoveryConnector​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils, ILogger logger) throws RemoteException
      Constructor for the class when no end point is to be published to the discovery server. THIS CLASS MUST BE INSTANTIATED *AFTER* RMIUtils HAS BEEN STARTED!
      Parameters:
      rmiUtils - The IRMIUtils object, already started.
      logger - The logger to use
      Throws:
      RemoteException - When there is a problem connecting to the remote discovery service

    • DiscoveryConnector

      public DiscoveryConnector​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils, ILogger logger, String discoveryName, String boundName) throws RemoteException
      Constructor for the class when an end point is to be published to the discover server. THIS CLASS MUST BE INSTANTIATED *AFTER* RMIUtils HAS BEEN STARTED!
      Parameters:
      rmiUtils - The IRMIUtils object, already started.
      logger - The logger to use
      discoveryName - The name to be viewed as in the discovery server by others.
      boundName - The name to which the RMI stub will be bound to in the local Registry
      Throws:
      RemoteException - When there is a problem connecting to the remote discovery service

  • Method Details

    • init

      private void init​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils) throws RemoteException
      Initialize the discovery connector
      Parameters:
      rmiUtils - The IRMIUtils to use
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if error when connecting to discovery server

    • connectToDiscoveryServer

      public void connectToDiscoveryServer​(String category, boolean watchOnly, Consumer<Iterable<IEndPointData>> updateFn) throws RemoteException
      Connect to the remote discovery service using the given category, registering the local endpoint when watchOnly=False This is the method that IDiscoveryPanelAdapter's connectToDiscoveryServer() method wants to call.
      Parameters:
      category - The category on the remote discovery service to monitor
      watchOnly - If True, only connect to the remote discovery service and watch it, otherwise also register the local endpoint when connecting.
      updateFn - A Consumer of an iterable of endpoints used, for instance, by the DiscoveryPanel to update the list of active endpoints in the category.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - When a problem occurs connect to or registering with the remote discovery service

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects the current internal IDiscoveryServer object, if it exists.
